author: benjaminchodroff
content:
CLWP version 1.0 is now released: 
https://github.com/benjaminchodroff/ConsensusLayerWithdrawalProtection/releases/tag/clwp-v1.0

We encourage all CLWP volunteers to load all mainnet submissions into your beacon nodes when you feel ready to do so. It is still possible for us to receive a contested submission via Kleros until 2023/03/29. We have received none so far. For volunteer instructions using ethdo, please see: https://github.com/benjaminchodroff/ConsensusLayerWithdrawalProtection#volunteer
